Paragraph: The results provide new insight into the potential role of ectopic hilar granule cells in the pilocarpine model of temporal lobe epilepsy .

| ectopic |
| hilar granule cells |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

The term "ectopic" refers to the abnormal positioning of cells or tissues, but it does not directly refer to a specific chemical compound. "Hilar granule cells" are a type of neuron, not a chemical. "Temporal lobe epilepsy" is a neurological condition, not a chemical.
